test.name: TC01 Verify Add Todo Item

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Web Input Text
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Buy groceries' into text field '//*[@id="new-task"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Types the given text into text field identified by locator. See introduction for details about locating elements.

kw.name: Web Click Button
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
Click button identified by locator. attributes for arbitrary elements are id and name. See introduction for details about locating elements.

kw.name: Web Click Element
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Click element identified by locator. attributes for arbitrary elements are id and name. See introduction for details about locating elements.

kw.name: Web Element Should Contain
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element '(//span[@class='mdl-checkbox__label' and starts-with(@id, 'text-')])[last()]' contains text 'Buy groceries'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

Verifies element identified by locator exactly contains text expected. In contrast to Element Should Contain, this keyword does not try a substring match but an exact match on the element identified by locator. message can be used to override the default error message. Key attributes for arbitrary elements are id and name. See introduction for details about locating elements.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Run Keyword And Continue On Failure
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
Runs the keyword and continues execution even if a failure occurs.

kw.arg: Run Keyword And Continue On Failure
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

test.doc: ทดสอบการ Add รายการใน Todo List
